name: World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets
name_original: World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets
description:
World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets is a card game developed by Left Field Productions. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Activision Value Publishing.
World Series of Poker 2008: Battle for the Bracelets is available on PC.
